name: Wood Elf
description: As a wood elf, you have keen senses and intuition, and your fleet feet carry you quickly and stealthily through your native forests. Where high elves build cities, wood elves forge a life in harmony with the untamed wilderness. They are superlative archers and hunters, their connection to the wild granting them the ability to blend into the scenery and move with a speed unmatched by their kin.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can’t put you to sleep.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: You don’t need to sleep. Instead, you meditate deeply for 4 hours a day.

traits.name: Elf Weapon Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

traits.name: Fleet of Foot
traits.description: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

traits.name: Mask of the Wild
traits.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.
